description: Results from the computation of the MKB constant
README.md:
# **MKB Constant**
The MKB Constant is defined as:

![limit_{N -> infinity} integral((-1)^x*x^(1/x),x=1..2*N).](http://felisphasma.github.io/files/mkbConstant.png)

## **My current calculation record**
> **1000 Digits**
0.

See the `Computation log.txt` file for more information.

## **Huge thanks**
Marvin Ray Burns ([@MarvinRBurns](https://twitter.com/MarvinRBurns)) has been an enormous help with calculating this number. I was originally getting an incorrect calculation, but Marvin R. Burns was able to help me produce a correct computation.
